definition: see 白鱀豚|白𬶨豚[bai2 ji4 tun2]

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: As China developed economically, pressure on the river dolphin grew significantly.
sentences.chinese: 隨着中國經濟的發展，對白鰭豚的壓力也越來越重。

sentences.english: But it was too late for the baiji.
sentences.chinese: 但是對於白鰭豚而言，這一措施太晚了。

sentences.english: Only a few hundred were left by 1970.
sentences.chinese: 到1970年時，白鰭豚的數量只剩下了幾百只。

sentences.english: The baiji dolphin, the ancient river sturgeon and the finless porpoise depend on the Yangtze fortheir survival.
sentences.chinese: 白鰭豚，古老的鱘魚和江豚都生活在長江中。

sentences.english: That was the last baiji Chen and other scientists laid eyes on.
sentences.chinese: 那是陳佩薰和其他科學家見到的最後一頭白鰭豚。

sentences.english: Now, it is time to find ways to save the Finless Porpoise .
sentences.chinese: 現在，是時候尋求拯救白鰭豚的時候了。
